title: Missing in West London: Episode 305
description:
When his wife didn't catch up with him in Soho after her meeting at the BBC, David Chenery-Wickens reported her missing to police. It was most unlike Diane not to let her know where she was, just where could she be?  But Diane didn't come home and five months later her body was found near her home in East Sussex.....
